info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 23 at 7:27AM CDT until August 24 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Aberdeen SD
info.description:
...The National Weather Service in Aberdeen SD has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in South Dakota...
Big Sioux River at Watertown Sioux Conifer Road affecting Codington County.
.For sites with a river forecast, the forecast includes precipitation through the next 24 hours. Any future precipitation could affect the forecasts.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...Big Sioux River at Watertown Sioux Conifer Road.
* WHEN...From this morning to tomorrow morning.
* IMPACTS...At 10.0 feet, Significant amounts of pasture land are flooded.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:15 AM CDT Saturday the stage was 9.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 9.1 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage just after midnight tonight. - Flood stage is 9.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/abr.
The next statement will be issued by Sunday morning at 700 AM CDT.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO TOMORROW MORNING
